DESCRIPTION:
In the yard in 2054. The magic returned to the world, evoking powerful creatures of myth and legend,
where technology is fused with the body and mind. Elves, trolls, orcs and dwarves walk among us, while
ruthless corporation depletes the bloody world. You 'Running in the Shadows' - Mercenary, who lives on the
outskirts of the survivors, in the shadow of the massive corporate arcology. You have to look for a job at any
cost in order to survive. Overgrown In Seattle Metroplex you go in search of the mysterious assassin, traces
of which will lead you to places ranging from the dark slums and ending megakorpusami. You will need
to carefully deystovat, with the support of other runners. Need to master the powerful technology and magic
to escape the shadow of the Seattle sound.
